title: South African scientists say new coronavirus variant has 'concerning' number of mutations | TheHill
content:
1. South African scientists say new coronavirus variant has 'concerning' number of mutations | TheHill  The Hill
  2. New Covid-19 variant C.1.2 has mutations like the delta and beta variants in different combinations  Radio 702

  4. ASL Video Series: COVID-19 Variants  Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
